settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account information and preferences
settings.name: Name
settings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?
settings.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Redirecting to login...
settings.failedLoadCredentials: Failed to load credentials. Please try refreshing the page.
settings.confirmDeletePasskey:
Are you sure you want to remove this passkey?

Note: This will remove the passkey from your account, but you may need to manually delete it from your device's settings (like iCloud Keychain, Google Password Manager, or Windows Hello).

Make sure you have tested your other passkey(s) work before removing this one.
settings.emailChangeWarning: Changes to your email address will require verification before taking effect.
settings.emailVerificationMessage: A verification email has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox and click the verification link.
settings.passkeysDescription: Your account uses passkeys for secure, passwordless authentication. Passkeys are stored securely on your device and provide better security than traditional passwords.
settings.placeholderPasskeyName: Enter a name for this passkey
settings.addPasskeyHelp: Add a passkey for another device or browser
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
settings.deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete your account.

errors.loadCredentials: Failed to load credentials. Please try refreshing the page.
errors.updateProfile: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
errors.deleteAccount: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
errors.deletePasskey: Failed to delete passkey. Please try again.
errors.updatePasskeyName: Failed to update passkey name. Please try again.
errors.passkeyCreationCancelled: Passkey creation was cancelled or timed out.
errors.sessionExpired: Authentication error: Your session may have expired. Please refresh the page and try again.
errors.addPasskey: Failed to add new passkey. Please try again.
